name: Go Fish - Sea Adventure
description:
Swim through under sea adventure avoiding the variety of hindrance and bottleneck that can stop you. Beware of the bigger species of fish, shellfish and many more. Collect smaller fishes to to unlock other skins. The under water adventure will flee you with an amazing experience where you ned to dive under and above.

How to play:

Tap and hold to swim

• Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone
• Master your skills and score huge combos
• Unlock different species
• Compete with your friends and share your discoveries

If you love this game, feel free to share it!
